name: THE COLLABORATION STACK | TEMPLATE
description:
How do we overcome these roadblocks? How can we orchestrate collective intelligence and action across domains, leveraging both the unique qualities of physical spaces and a limitless network of virtual participants?


These questions provoked a collaboration between Swissnex in Boston and SOSO. In a three-week research sprint from May-June 2021, we ideated new frameworks for collaborating across physical and digital space.


Idealistic and experimental by design, this slide deck – its sketches, outlines, and case studies – is the product of our creative process. An open-ended conceptual framework, it is meant to inspire, to jump-start conversation, and to be elaborated into future forms for practical applications.
